autorun.expression: @@(() => {const {id, parentSetState, responseData, formStatus, formValues, payload} = response; parentSetState(s => ({...s, isPaymentDue: responseData.dueAmount > 0, goto:'summary', [id]: { ...s[id], status: formStatus, formValues, response: responseData, payload }})); })()

template: Please choose new bill cycle date:

widgetProps.disabledDate: @@(() => { const BLOCKED_UI_DAYS = [29, 30, 31, 1, 2, 3,data.accountDetails.billCycle]; let BLOCK_ALL_UNTIL = moment().subtract(1, 'days').format('YYYYMMDD'); let BLOCKED_AFTER = moment().add(1,'month').format('YYYYMMDD');let TODAY = moment().format('YYYYMMDD'); const billCycleInfo = data.accountInfo.accountDetails.billCycleResetDetails;  if (billCycleInfo.billCycleResetBlockIndicator && billCycleInfo.blockBillCycleResetTillDate) { BLOCK_ALL_UNTIL = moment(billCycleInfo.blockBillCycleResetTillDate).format('YYYYMMDD'); }  return (current) => { const day = current && +current.format('DD'); const curr = current && current.format('YYYYMMDD'); if (current.format('YYYYMMDD') === TODAY && !BLOCKED_UI_DAYS.includes(day)) {return false;} return (curr < BLOCK_ALL_UNTIL || BLOCKED_UI_DAYS.includes(day) || (curr > BLOCKED_AFTER && curr < BLOCK_ALL_UNTIL)); } })();
widgetProps.renderExtraFooter: @@() => {if (data.accountInfo.accountDetails.billCycleResetDetails.billCycleResetBlockIndicator) {  const lastBillCycleResetDate = data.accountInfo.accountDetails.billCycleResetDetails.lastBillCycleResetDate; const blockBillCycleResetTillDate = data.accountInfo.accountDetails.billCycleResetDetails.blockBillCycleResetTillDate; const formatDate = (dateString) => { return dateString.substr(0, 4).concat('/', dateString.substr(4,2).concat('/',dateString.substr(6)))}; return `Customer made a future dated bill cycle change on ${formatDate(lastBillCycleResetDate)} and is blocked from future dating the bill cycle until ${formatDate(blockBillCycleResetTillDate)}.` } return null;}
